name: First Citizens
description: C².WORLD's educational metaverse product offers an exclusive commemorative NFT named "First Citizen" for our first batch of users. This NFT symbolizes the user's status as an early participant and contributor. It is non-transferable and cannot be traded, emphasizing its unique commemorative value and exclusivity. By holding the "First Citizen," users become a part of the C².WORLD community, enjoying future exclusive benefits and honors.
